channel.title: Cloud Computing on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Computing on FinanClub

item.title: HPE
item.description: score:233 Chances: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) is expanding its AIOps network management capabilities by integrating generative AI Large Language Models (LLMs) within HPE Aruba Networking Central. Verizon Business is expanding its managed services portfolio to include HPE Aruba Networking Central. HPE’s cloud-native network management solution is hosted on the HPE GreenLake Cloud Platform.

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:231 Chances: Oracle (ORCL) has been recognized as a Leader in the IDC MarketScape: U.S. Electronic Health Record (EHR) 2023-2024 Vendor Assessment, indicating potential for growth in the healthcare sector. Leading healthcare organizations are implementing Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite, suggesting a potential increase in customer base and revenue.
